NOTICE_DATA.n2016:PERFORMANCE_NUTS: ПОРАНЕШНА ЈУГОСЛОВЕНСКА РЕПУБЛИКА МАКЕДОНИЈА (PORANEŠNA JUGOSLOVENSKA REPUBLIKA MAKEDONIJA)

ML_TI_DOC.TI_CY: Dik li kienet ir-Repubblika Jugoslava tal-Maċedonja

OLD.P: IV.2.4) Technical and professional capability of the economic operator:

— Proof of vehicle permit (or agreement for support from other entity or agreements for leasing of fuel tank trucks) confirming that the economic operator has at least 2 (two) fuel tank trucks with a minimum 18 (eighteen) ton capacity, with minimum Euro 4 standard, installed and verified meter unit with valid seal and certificate issued by the Biro of Meteorology or legal entity authorized by the Minister of Economy (article 3, paragraph 15 of the Meteorology Law) through which the dispensing of the fuel to the tanks will be carried out,

— To have at least 2 (two) fuel tank trucks with a minimum 18 (eighteen) tons capacity (owned or rented technically operational fuel tank trucks), with minimum Euro 4 standard, installed and verified meter unit with valid seal and certificate issued by the Biro of Meteorology or legal entity authorized by the Minister of economy (Article 3, Paragraph 15 of the Meteorology Law) through which the dispensing of the fuel to the tanks will be carried out.
III.3)

NEW.P: IV.2.4) Technical and professional capability of the economic operator:

— Proof of vehicle permit (or agreement for support from other entity or agreements for leasing of fuel tank trucks) confirming that the economic operator has at least 2 (two) fuel tank trucks with a minimum 15 (fifeteen) ton capacity, with minimum Euro 4 standard, installed and verified meter unit with valid seal and certificate issued by the Biro of Meteorology or legal entity authorized by the Minister of Economy (article 3, paragraph 15 of the Meteorology Law) through which the dispensing of the fuel to the tanks will be carried out.

To have at least 2 (two) fuel tank trucks with a minimum 15 (fifteen) ton capacity (owned or rented technically operational fuel tank trucks), with minimum Euro 4 standard, installed and verified meter unit with valid seal and certificate issued by the Biro of Meteorology or legal entity authorized by the Minister of economy (Article 3, Paragraph 15 of the Meteorology Law) through which the dispensing of the fuel to the tanks will be carried out.
III.3)

— To have at least 2 (two) fuel tank trucks with a minimum 18 (eighteen) tons capacity (owned or rented technically operational fuel tank trucks), with minimum Euro 4 standard, installed and verified meter unit with valid seal and certificate issued by the Biro of Meteorology or legal entity authorized by the Minister of economy (Article 3, Paragraph 15 of the Meteorology Law) through which the dispensing of the fuel to the tanks will be carried out.
III.3)
